title: New client doesn't allow me to play
body: I just updated my league client and it wont open any more. I press the launch button the league logo pops up but nothing happens it just stops. Is anyone else having this problem any solutions.

replies.body: This can happen for a few reasons, mainly a security setting preventing the patcher from launching.  To start, though, restart your pc just in case something crashed in the background.  If the issue continues then go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
i have tried everything step in the permission guide and tried and my league still does not work.

That's really weird, but thanks for trying!  In that case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look individually.

Some extra logs from the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help too, which you can attack to the ticket.  We'll get back to you there!
I have the same problem, is there already a solution to this problem?
Checked my firewall and security settings, have re-installed a couple of times and restarted even more times. Nothing.
